sentences.sContent: Punch in the nails and then fill the holes flush with putty.
sentences.sContent_eng: Punch in the nails and then fill the holes flush with putty.
sentences.sCn: 把钉子钉进去，然后再用油灰把洞抹平。

phrases.pCn: n. [物]氧化锡粉（等于油灰粉）

trans.tranOther: a soft whitish substance that becomes hard when it dries and that is used to fix glass into window frames
